favourite.article: JESUS is a simple word to say but the most powerful name under the sun. Whenever, wherever and whoever needs peace, love joy, humility, wisdom, divine healing and all good and blessed things should ask Him in prayer and definitely he/she will get it. A WONDERFUL NAME ABOVE ALL NAMES. Amen.

5 Now ’tis past and over. Gone my guilt and shame; Jesus, Jesus did it, Glory to His Name!
O how awsome is our precious Jesus! One nanme that means so much! O I love my precious sweet and glorious Jesus! Praise His holy and glorious name! Blessings!
"Wonderful compassion reaching EVEN ME; bows my humbled spirit in CAPTIVITY."
"Never found the mystery in that simple word—Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Savior, Lover, Lord."
